1: <pb/><t>¡Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a Jehová! <pb/>Qui b'itquec 'ac' b'it 'a Jehová; an̈ec yic xo caji, qui b'itquec sb'i 'a 'aj yamn cajec.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Ex wit israelal, tzaljan̈c yuj jun mach 'ijnac 'el yich sb'on qui chon̈b'ec tic,*f3* ex 'aj Sión tzaljan̈c yet' qui Reyal.</t>
3: <t>Tzon̈ laj q'uec b'atnjoc calnec qui wach' paxti 'a 'a, qui b'itquec yet' qui arpa yet' pax qui pandero.</t>
4: <t>Yujto a Jehová tzyij stzaljc'ojlal 'a quib'n̈ec an̈ schon̈b' on̈c tic, ax ya'n qui tzaljc'ojal an̈ 'emmquilal queq'ui, yujto a tzon̈ colnec.</t>
5: <t>An̈ yiclum tzcutjec qui b'a 'a 'a, tzalj coyec, yujto tzca'c ganar. A yic tzon̈ wayc can 'ejmi tzqui b'itnanec 'a tzaljc'ojlal.</t>
6: <pb/><t>B'itn coyc 'a Dios, ax qui c'ab' a yamjnac qui espada chab' ye,</t>
7: <t>sec a yet' 'oj ca'c qui pac 'a eb' chuc chon̈b'al, ax ca'nec can 'och syailal jun tzo'n̈ xo nacion̈.</t>
8: <t>Ax qui jalnec can eb' rey niwc yopiso yet' q'uen niwc cadena caw 'al,</t>
9: <t>sec 'ixta tz'aj yel'ch tas tz'ib'b'il can 'a yib'n̈ eb'. A jun tic, qui wach'loc qui masnil an̈ yic on̈c xo Dios. <pb/>¡Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a Jehová!</t>
